cab.content: OPERATIONS. S E 0 R ,E T.Prom :- General Delme Radcliffe, Italy.To :- C.I.G.S., War Office..Handed in 27th December, 1917. Received 8.1 a,m. 28th December,1917.10077. December 27th cipher. Situation evening.3rd Army. Destructive bombardment of enemy defences at Zenson carried out by Italian Artillery. All their foot bridges were destroyed..' 4th Army. Nothing of importance. 1st Army. Situation unchanged. Slight artillery activity. An Italian patrol raided enemy's lines at Cunico leaving many dead and capturing 17 prisoners'. 5rd Corps. Nothing of importance. Aerial Activity. The total number of aeroplanes destroyed in yesterday!s raid now amounts to eleven of which three fell within enemy's lines.
